ValidationRule.description: Temporary validation rule to prevent users from adding Subscription Discount.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
AND( ISNEW(), NOT(CONTAINS($User.LastName, "Bypass")), NOT(CONTAINS($Profile.Name, "System Administrator")), NOT(CONTAINS($Profile.Name, "Finance")),
Product2.Name = "Subscription discount" )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Subscription Discount product should not be used any more. Please use "Change Sales Price" feature to apply an overall discount.
